verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Maskil of the sons of Korah.) O <S%H430>God,<s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears,<s%> Our fathers have <S%H1>told<s%> us, The <S%H5608>work<s%> that Thou <S%H6467>didst<s%> in their <S%H6466>days,<s%> In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3117>old.<s%>

Thou with Thine own <S%H3027>hand<s%> didst <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> Then Thou didst <S%H5193>plant<s%> them; Thou didst <S%H7489>afflict<s%> the <S%H3816>peoples,<s%> Then Thou didst <S%H7971>spread<s%> them abroad.

For by their own <S%H2719>sword<s%> they did not <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> And their own <S%H2220>arm<s%> did not <S%H3467>save<s%> them; But Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and Thine <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> of Thy <S%H6440>presence,<s%> For Thou didst <S%H7521>favor<s%> them.
Thou art my <S%H4428>King,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H6680>Command<s%> <S%H3444>victories<s%> for <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

Through Thee we will <S%H5055>push<s%> <S%H5055>back<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries;<s%> Through Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> we will <S%H947>trample<s%> <S%H947>down<s%> those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against us.
For I will not <S%H982>trust<s%> in my <S%H7198>bow,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
But Thou hast <S%H3467>saved<s%> us from our <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And Thou hast <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> us.

In <S%H430>God<s%> we have <S%H1984>boasted<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long, And we will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H637>Yet<s%> Thou hast <S%H2186>rejected<s%> [us] and <S%H3637>brought<s%> us to <S%H3637>dishonor,<s%> And dost not <S%H3318>go<s%> out with our <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
Thou dost cause us to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> from the <S%H6862>adversary;<s%> And those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> us have <S%H8154>taken<s%> <S%H8154>spoil<s%> for themselves.
Thou dost <S%H5414>give<s%> us as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> to be <S%H3978>eaten,<s%> And hast <S%H2219>scattered<s%> us among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H4376>sell<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3808>cheaply,<s%> <S%H1952><s%> And hast not <S%H7235>profited<s%> by their <S%H4242>sale.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> A <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> and a <S%H7047>derision<s%> to those <S%H5439>around<s%> us.
Thou dost <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H4912>byword<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> A <S%H4493>laughingstock<s%> <S%H7218><s%> among the <S%H3816>peoples.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long my <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> is <S%H5048>before<s%> me, And my <S%H1322>humiliation<s%> <S%H6440><s%> has <S%H3680>overwhelmed<s%> me,

<S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him who <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> and <S%H1442>reviles,<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy<s%> and the <S%H5358>avenger.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> upon us, but we have not <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> Thee, And we have not <S%H8266>dealt<s%> <S%H8266>falsely<s%> with Thy <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
Our <S%H3820>heart<s%> has not <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> And our <S%H9036>steps<s%> have not <S%H5186>deviated<s%> from Thy <S%H734>way,<s%>
<S%H3588>Yet<s%> Thou hast <S%H1794>crushed<s%> us in a <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H8565>jackals,<s%> And <S%H3680>covered<s%> us with the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> we had <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> Or <S%H6566>extended<s%> our <S%H3709>hands<s%> to a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god;<s%>
Would not <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2713>find<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> out? For He <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
But for Thy <S%H5921>sake<s%> we are <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long; We are <S%H2803>considered<s%> as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> to be <S%H2878>slaughtered.<s%>
<S%H5782>Arouse<s%> Thyself, <S%H4100>why<s%> dost Thou <S%H3462>sleep,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%>? <S%H9516>Awake,<s%> do not <S%H2186>reject<s%> us <S%H5331>forever.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> dost Thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> And <S%H7911>forget<s%> our <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression<s%>?
For our <S%H5315>soul<s%> has <S%H7743>sunk<s%> <S%H7743>down<s%> into the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> Our <S%H990>body<s%> <S%H1692>cleaves<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H6965>Rise<s%> up, be our <S%H5833>help,<s%> And <S%H6299>redeem<s%> us for the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
